snippet: The inaugural Montclair Food and Wine Festival takes place on June 1 and 2 at the Woman’s Club of Upper Montclair, with a “grand tasting” the first night and a gala dinner the second.
abstract: First annual Montclair Food and Wine Festival will take place on June 1 and 2 at Women's Club of Upper Montclair; event will include 'grand tasting' on first night and gala dinner on second (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The inaugural Montclair Food and Wine Festival takes place on June 1 and 2 at the Woman’s Club of Upper Montclair, with a “grand tasting” the first night and a gala dinner the second.

headline.seo: The First Montclair Food and Wine Festival is a Fest for Local Tastes
headline.main: A First Fest for Local Tastes
headline.print_headline: A First Fest For Local Tastes
